Text:
Hey Agentbay. Thanks for the kind words:D Really appreciate your support:)

@Trin02 - Hey Trin.... I do appreciate your request but I'm trying to be original and do older classic movies as they are extremely hard to find. I will do the odd new movie now and again but everyone else is doing that so I wanted to expand "the market" a little bit and go for the classics.

What's the difference between these VIDEO_TS folders and an .iso image (which I'm more familiar with)? Can I just burn & forget, or is there more of an art to it? Any explenatory links would be much appreciated.
